mean_en: the rights and advantages that rich and powerful people in a society have; a special right or advantage that a particular person or group of people has
sentence: He enjoys the privilege of being able to fast check in at the airport he owns.
sentence_trans: 他享有在他的机场里快速登机的特权。
word_etyma: privi单个 + lege法律 → 有个人法律 → privilege特权
